title: Projectile motion-ball kicked at an angle

content.question: A projectile is launched from level ground with initial velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, at an angle <math alttext="theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>θ</mi></math> above horizontal. Which of the following is an expression for the total time the projectile is in the air?

choices.label: <math alttext="t equals the fraction with numerator v sub 0, times the cosine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, times the cosine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals the fraction with numerator v sub 0, times the sine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, times the sine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="t equals the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, times the sine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
